sql.query: SELECT TRD_DD, CAST(CLSPRC as int), CODE FROM CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE IN (${code}) AND TRD_DD BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY TRD_DD

SELECT a.TRD_DD, CAST(a.CLSPRC as int), a.CODE FROM CHART_TEST_DATA a, CHART_TEST_DATA_NUM b WHERE a.TRD_DD = b.TRD_DD AND a.CODE IN (${code}) AND b.NUM BETWEEN (SELECT MIN(NUM) FROM CHART_TEST_DATA_NUM WHERE TRD_DD <= ? AND CODE IN (${code})) AND (SELECT MIN(NUM) FROM CHART_TEST_DATA_NUM WHERE TRD_DD <= ? AND CODE IN (${code})) + 99 ORDER BY a.CODE, a.TRD_DD

SELECT a.TRD_DD, CAST(a.CLSPRC as int), a.CODE FROM CHART_TEST_DATA a, CHART_TEST_DATA_NUM b WHERE a.TRD_DD = b.TRD_DD AND a.CODE = b.CODE AND a.CODE IN (${code}) AND b.GUBUN = 'Y' ORDER BY a.CODE, a.TRD_DD

SELECT a.TRD_DD, CAST(a.CLSPRC as int), a.CODE FROM CHART_TEST_DATA a, (SELECT MIN(TRD_DD) TRD_DD FROM CHART_TEST_DATA GROUP BY SUBSTR(TRD_DD,1,6)) b WHERE a.TRD_DD = b.TRD_DD AND a.CODE IN (${code}) ORDER BY a.TRD_DD
